SQL.LOAD: SELECT code, description, validation_regex, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, answer_type_item_id, look_up_list_code, answer_type_id FROM elp_answer_type WHERE answer_type_id = :answer_type_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_answer_type SET code = :code, description = :description, validation_regex = :validation_regex, answer_type_item_id = :answer_type_item_id, look_up_list_code = :look_up_list_code, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE answer_type_id = :answer_type_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_answer_type ( code, description, validation_regex, answer_type_item_id, look_up_list_code, created_by, answer_type_id ) VALUES ( :code, :description, :validation_regex, :answer_type_item_id, :look_up_list_code, :created_by, :answer_type_id )
